before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"83npq","text":"Parent C. elegans worm cultures should be reared on Nematode Growth Medium (NGM) plates with OP50 lawns according to standard protocols (see WormBook’s “Maintenance of C. elegans”), roughly 2-4 days before Day 0. All reagents in the Direct-Zol RNA MiniPrep Kit (Zymo R2051) and ONT Direct RNA Sequencing Kit (ONT SQK-RNA004), including the MinION RNA flow cells (FLO-MIN004RA), should be brought to room temperature on Day 3.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":7,"length":10},{"style":"italic","offset":168,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":153,"length":25}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1D8BA74A826911EFA3260A58A9FEAC02","url":"http://www.wormbook.org/chapters/www_strainmaintain/strainmaintain.html"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"a7nu3","text":"This protocol entails sequencing native RNA of young adult C. elegans using NanoPore sequencing (Oxford NanoPore Technologies, ONT). RNA extraction will be conducted using modified versions of Zymo’s “Direct-zol‱ RNA Miniprep” (Zymo R2050) and ONT’s “Worm (Caenorhabditis elegans) RNA” protocols. Library preparation will be conducted according to ONT’s Direct RNA Sequencing Kit (ONT SQK-RNA004) protocols and sequencing will be conducted on a MinION Mk1C device (Figure 1). Subsequent analysis should be conducted via alignment and assembly by the wf-transciptomes workflow in EPI2ME followed by followed by differential expression analysis with DESeq2 and functional enrichment with Goseq and KOBAS 2.0 in R Studio.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":59,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":201,"length":24},{"key":1,"offset":251,"length":33},{"key":2,"offset":354,"length":25}],"data":{}},{"key":"72dh1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"edsj9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"an285","text":" steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"821f3","text":"Culture C. elegans on   plates (NGM agar plates) until adulthood and/or they have begun laying eggs onto the E. coli lawn.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":8,"length":10},{"style":"italic","offset":109,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"43aqm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"426C6CB7341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Nematode growth media agarose","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"substance_media_ngma","stats":{"total_protocols":1},"url":null,"vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/1.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.protocols.io","name":"Contributed by users"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4gqg","text":"Prepare fresh bleaching solution in a sterile 1.5mL microcentrifuge tube:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5kq6i","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f14qh","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"en1l","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2pukh","text":"       Volume (μl)     DI Water   250     Bleach   250     1M NaOH   500   ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":75}],"data":{}},{"key":"c9kgq","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":[],"colWidths":[],"data":[["   "," Volume (μl) "],[" DI Water "," 250 "],[" Bleach "," 250 "],[" 1M NaOH "," 500 "]],"guid":"704B33EAE13842A3AF5E6A9FFDC594DF","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":[],"printData":[["   "," Volume (μl) "],[" DI Water "," 250 "],[" Bleach "," 250 "],[" 1M NaOH "," 500 "]],"rowHeights":[]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5hgn6","text":"Using a P1000, add 1mL of M9+TX  + 0.1% Triton-X-100  (22mM KH2PO4, 42mM NA2HPO4, 89mM NaCl, 1mM MgSO4, 0.1% Triton X-100) to a plate of worms. With the same tip, pipette the solution across the plate multiple times to wash the worms off of the lawn into the solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":18},{"style":"bold","offset":123,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2db7h","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41ABD8A3341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"M9 solution for nematode culture","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"","stats":{"total_protocols":9},"url":"https://www.protocols.io/view/preparing-10-l-of-m9-buffer-for-nematode-culture-3kngkve","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/1.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.protocols.io","name":"Contributed by users"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27sbf","text":"Transfer the worms to a new 1.5mL microcentrifuge tube and centrifuge for 10 sec to pellet the worms.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":59,"length":21},{"style":"bold","offset":81,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3qqng","text":"Remove the supernatant and add the bleaching solution.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":27,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pfno","text":"Incubate for  ( 2-5 minutes), shaking occasionally, until the majority of the worm bodies have been dissolve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":15,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"acmg4","text":"\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e7hra","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"eomn9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9i9hh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"bold"}],"key":"6qogt","text":"IMPORTANT: Do not allow more than 5 minutes of incubation in the bleaching solution. The point of this step is to dissolve the bodies of the adult worms but leave the eggs unharmed, which is time-dependent. On the opposite side, if the bodies have not been sufficiently broken up then they could retain residual bleach, which would additionally harm future progeny.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fp5e","text":"Centrifuge for 10-20 sec to pellet. Remove the supernatant and resuspend in M9+TX.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24},{"style":"bold","offset":63,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c2kk5","text":"Repeat Step 7 two more times (for a total of 3 washes).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":13},{"style":"bold","offset":45,"length":8}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5l41d","text":"Centrifuge for 10-20 sec to pellet, then remove 990μl of supernatant, leaving 50-100μl in the tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":24},{"style":"bold","offset":70,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9m5ec","text":"Using a P100, resuspend the pellet in the 50-100μl of M9+TX, then transfer to a fresh NGM plate by pipetting droplets of eggs outside of the lawn.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":45},{"style":"bold","offset":66,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbqsd","text":"Wait   (5-10 minutes) for the plate to dry.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6},{"style":"bold","offset":8,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9t3g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"68tj5","text":"Store the plate upside-down in a 20°C incubator until the eggs have hatched and reach young adult (roughly 60hr) or another desired age.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":33,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bqai0","text":"Using a P1000, add 1mL of M9+TX to the plate of worms.
